item.title: Minimalism vs Materialism
item.description: In the past few days, I exposed myself to different forms of documentaries with topics ranging from art , culture, heritage to human psyche and much more. I realized even though we watch different things the key essence of their origination starts from a similar set of thoughts. When I pinned them down , they all came to this single point : “survival”. Everything that is around us, the start of a civilization, culture, art or community , came from survival.
